inclusion.criterion: intermediate or no obstructive coronary disease
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no coronary stenosis >70% in an artery >2.5 mm

exclusion.criterion: obstructive disease in a coronary artery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: circumferential plaque extending for ≥2 coronary segments
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: stenosis>70% as revealed by CT coronary angiography
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: patient has carotid bruits, significant bilateral carotid stenosis
